title: Keyless ECM Calibration - Failed Download Recovery Flow Chart

body.body: Keyless ECM Calibration - Failed Download Recovery Flow Chart

If a keyless ECM calibration download fails for any reason, it is possible that any existing software and immobiliser system pairings may have been erased from the keyless ECM’s memory. Where this is the case, the keyless ECM can be recovered as described below.
If after completing this procedure, the download continues to fail, contact Triumph Service.

body.name: Keyless ECM - Failed Calibration Download Recovery
